original_text: Complainant: Mr. Rajesh Kumar. Date: 05-07-2024. FIR No: 172/2024, Gandhi Nagar PS, Delhi. Crime: Theft under IPC 457 and 380. Someone broke the rear window of the complainant’s house and stole a laptop and mobile phone worth Rs. 35,000.
reference_simplified: On 05-07-2024, a theft was reported under FIR 172/2024 at Gandhi Nagar Police Station. Someone broke the window and stole a laptop and phone worth Rs 35,000.

original_text: Complainant: Mrs. Asha Sharma. On 11-09-2024, at Malviya Nagar PS, a purse containing ₹8,000 and ID proof was stolen from a market area. Case registered under IPC 379.
reference_simplified: On 11-09-2024, at Malviya Nagar, a purse with ₹8,000 and ID was stolen. The case is filed under IPC 379.

original_text: FIR No: 244/2024. Victim: Ramesh Singh. Location: Model Town. Crime: Burglary. Gold chain and cash Rs 50,000 were taken. Door was found forced open.
reference_simplified: A burglary occurred at Model Town where a gold chain and Rs 50,000 cash were stolen. The door was forced open.

original_text: Complainant: Imran Khan. On 19-03-2024, an unknown person snatched a mobile phone worth Rs 18,000 near City Bus Stop. FIR registered under IPC 356 and 379.
reference_simplified: On 19-03-2024, a mobile phone worth Rs 18,000 was snatched near the bus stop. The case is filed under IPC 356 and 379.

original_text: Report from Anna Nagar PS. FIR 332/2024. Crime: Vehicle theft. A Honda Activa scooter (TN 12 AB 1190) was stolen from parking area at 10 PM yesterday. Case under IPC 379.
reference_simplified: A scooter (TN 12 AB 1190) was stolen from a parking area at 10 PM. The case is registered under IPC 379.
